text: Munofiqon az ʙimi tarsason gumon mekunand, ki laskarhoi Ahzoʙ hanuz naraftaand va agar on laskarhoi kofiron ʙori digar ʙa Madina ʙargardand orzu mekardand in munofiqon, ki kos az Madina ƣoiʙ meʙudand va dar mijoni a'roʙi ʙodijanisin meʙudand va az axʙori sumo mepursidand, agar ham dar mijoni sumo meʙudand, ʙa saʙaʙi ʙisjor ʙuzdiliason cuz andake cang namekardand
